sentences.english: Very imaginative and interesting. Its theme is similar to the Chinese folk story.
sentences.chinese: 富有想象力，主題與中國的牛郎織女相似，很有意趣。

sentences.english: Only once a year, the couple could meet on the Milky Way.
sentences.chinese: 牛郎與織女一年才能在鵲橋上相會一次。

sentences.english: Weaver steal the dress of white as snow.

sentences.english: It means that Zhinu is weeping.

sentences.english: It was that night, in the Milky Way to wash hair will cowboy.
sentences.chinese: 相傳，這天晚上織女會在銀河洗髮去會牛郎。

sentences.english: It is said that the Herd-boy and Waving-girl can meet only on that evening every year.
sentences.chinese: 傳說，牽牛和織女每年只有在在這個時候才能想見。

sentences.english: He reasoned that the fairies needed to wear their beautiful clothes if they wanted to fly.
sentences.chinese: 因爲他知道織女必須穿上羽衣，才能飛回天上。

sentences.english: We couples who have been separated hate the ruthless "The Milky Way".
sentences.chinese: 我們這些牛郎織女都恨透了那條無情的“天河”。

sentences.english: However, it is still a day to celebrate the annual meeting of the loving couple, the Cowherd and the Girl Weaver.
sentences.chinese: 然而，它仍是牛郎織女一年一度的鵲橋相會日。

sentences.english: Thus, they began to narrate , like that night, the narrative Cowboy and the Weaver Girl.
sentences.chinese: 於是，他們開始敘說，就像那夜，牛郎和織女的敘說。

sentences.english: The cowherd saw this and offered to take her to his house.
sentences.chinese: 牛郎看到哭泣的織女就把她帶回家。

sentences.english: The most well-known legend is the romantic yet heartrending story of the Cowherd and the Weaving Maid.
sentences.chinese: 最廣爲人知的傳說是牛郎與織女浪漫卻悲傷的故事。
